text: Former Illinois Gov. James R. Thompson dies at age 84. A Republican from Chicago, ‘Big Jim’ served 4 terms.
Mayor Lightfoot, police and critics address response to looting that rocked city and gained negative national attention: ‘We’re setting ourselves up for a three-peat Chicago doesn’t want'
Those charged with downtown Chicago looting a mix of college students, out-of-work parents and convicted felons. But none have obvious ties to Englewood.
